page.title: 17FISHING
page.content: TODAY DARREN AND I WENT DOWN MARGATE HARBOUR AND WE ASKED MY DAD SOME QUESTIONS AND THIS IS WHAT HE SAID.... "I GET A WEEK AT LEAST 1OO POUNDS SOMETIMES LESS.I HAVE TWO BOATS,A LITTLE BOAT AND A BIG TRAULER.I KEEP THE LITTLE BOAT AT MARGATE HARBOUR AND I KEEP THE TRAULER AT RAMSGATE,THE MOST FISH I HAVE EVER CAUGHT IN ONE DAY IS 12O.I CAN NAME SOME OF THE FISH.BASS SKATE AND SOLES.SOMETIMES I CATCH CRABS AND JELLYFISH". THEN WE ASKED MY UNCLE RAY.... "I GET 90 POUNDS A WEEK AND I HAVE ONE BOAT WHICH CAN GO AT LEAST 15 KNOTS. THE MOST FISH I HAVE CAUGHT IN A DAY IS 150. THE FISH THAT I CATCH ARE SOLES, LOBSTERS,PUNGER CRABS AND COD.
